name: Concentric Industries
description: Concentric is an EFCOM (Engineer + Finance + Construct + Operate + Maintain) corporation that creates facilities that make pure Energy, Food, Air & Water to improve Quality of Life on earth. Our vision is, at once, both practical and momentous: Creating a Future where natural technologies provide billions of people with pristine drinking water, nutritious food and access to clean energy. Our toolkit of proven, patented and pollutionFREE® techniques is unrivaled in human history because we have the moxie to continually ask … WHAT IF … we think we have the Answers, but it’s the Questions we have wrong? WHAT IF … Air and Water are Cleaner COMING OUT of power plants, factories and farms than GOING IN? WHAT IF … people aren’t the problem, but POVERTY is? TrueProsperity™ is possible because Concentric’s “All Gain Sum”™ annihilates the ‘zero sum game’.
